Package evaluation

Class Evaluation

  • java.lang.Object
    • evaluation.Evaluation

  • public class Evaluation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to access the monitoring data from the SQLite database and automatically perform some aggregations on them. The values that are currently monitored during a simulation correspond to the different values of ColumnType.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.text.SimpleDateFormat DATE_FORMAT
      Specifies the date format that is used for all date strings that are used in the evaluation process.
      private static java.lang.String[] DB_NAMES
      Specifies the names of all databases for which the configured evaluation should be executed.
      private static java.lang.String DB_PATH
      Indicates the path at which the databases from the simulation runs that should be evaluated are located.
      private static java.lang.String endDateString  
      private static java.util.ArrayList<EvaluationSpecification> evaluationColumns
      List of evaluation elements.
      private static java.lang.String evaluationName
      Name of the directory in which the output files will be stored.
      private static SimulationEvaluator evaluator  
      private static int millisecondsPerAggregationInterval
      Specifies the amount of milliseconds that each aggregation interval of possible evaluations that produce aggregated values has.
      private static java.lang.String outputPath
      Specifies the path at which the output files should be located.
      private static java.lang.String startDateString
      Start and end dates that are used to select the values that are relevant for the evaluation.
